Description: Part of a wooden panel painting: hand.
Curator's comments: An international project to prepare a corpus of small panel paintings from Egypt was led by Prof Thomas Mathews, Univ. New York/Prof. Norman Miller, Univ. Princeton/Dr Vincent Rondot, Univ. Lille. As part of their research, the team visited the BM on 23-24 June 2005 and took a pigment sample from this panel.
Bibliographic references: Rondot 2013 / Derniers visages des dieux d'Egypte: Iconographies, panthéons et cultes dans le Fayoum hellénisé des IIe-IIIe siècles de notre ère (pp.159, 341)
